adjectives.description: indecisive (comparative more indecisive, superlative most indecisive)

entries.meaning: (of a person) Not decisive; not marked by promptness or decision.
examples: They were all being very indecisive about what to wear to the party.

entries.meaning: (of a contest etc.) inconclusive or uncertain
examples: The outcome of the race was so indecisive.
